item.title: Advantech USB-4761 relays, C++ and Python
item.description: Recently I was trying to control the relays of an Advantech USB-4761 DAQ-module from a Linux box in a Python project. I decided to write a little post about it because I couldn’t find any good documentation or a StackOverflow answer that would suit my needs. Maybe someone will face a similar problem someday and end up here. The DAQNavi library I downloaded the Linux DAQNavi driver install script from Advantech’s website and ran it.
